name: Dettesuger
description:
Meet Stabbley. He's a snowman that got poorly assembled outside the house of a great hero, the chosen one in fact. In the wake of this warrior's adventures, a spattering of magic has trailed behind him, causing the wintery environment prove signs of the aftermath. Also, several ornaments have been dropped in the hero's clumsiness. 

Help Stabbley collect all the shiny ornaments he's so fond of without falling prey to the landscape!

Features:

*Parkour!

*Fun winter textures! (Provided by Losev Valera (2D Platformer Winter), Gamertose (Winter Wonderland), andUnity Asset Store; and ÇAĞLAYAN KARAGÖZLER (Nice Materials Pack Vol. 1)

*A snowman named Stabbley

Play using the left and right arrow keys to move and space bar to jump!

If you're playing on Windows, I can't rename the .exe without breaking the build. 'Project 2' is the correct game!

This game was made with guidance from D.S. Cohen and Alex Iveroth, University of Texas at Austin
